IP addresses and metadata are processed only briefly for site delivery and are not stored long-term. You have the right to access, rectify, delete, restrict processing, and data portability (Articles 15–20 GDPR), and you may object to processing (Article 21 GDPR). You also have the right to file a complaint with a supervisory authority. No cookies, analytics, or tracking tools are used.
